title: Mapping the Woods: Maps and Cartography
description: In Mapping the Woods: Maps and Cartography, readers are introduced to a variety of maps including physical, political, and data maps. Samples of each type of map, as well as explanations about scale, keys, landmarks, and symbols, are provided.
highFrequencyWords: boundary, cartographers, compass rose, elevation, key, landmarks, pictorial map, relief maps, scale, statistics, surveying, topographic map
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Commas                : Identify commas in a series
awareness: Content Vocabulary                : Recognize and use content vocabulary
phonics:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
